definitions.title: vb. denom. Hiph.
definitions.body: go to or choose the right, use the right hand;—Impf. 1 s. coh. [[יְאֵימִ֫נׇה]] Ge 13:10 (J) then I will go to the right (opp. [[וְאַשְׂמְאִילָה]]); 2 mpl. [[תַּאֲמִינוּ]] Is 30:21, fig. of turning aside from right course of life (‖[[תַּשְׂמְאִילוּ]]); Inf. cstr. in phr. [[אִם־אִשׁ לְהֵמִין]] [[וּלְהַשְׂמִיל מִכּׂל אֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר אֲדׂנִי הַמֶּלֶח]] 2Sa 14:19 it is surely impossible to turn the right or to the left, etc.; Imv. fs. [[הֵימִ֫ינִי]] Ez Eze 21:21 go to the right! (opp. [[הַשְׂמִ֫ילִי]]); Pt. pl. use the right hand: [[מַיְמִינִים]] [[וּמִשְׂמִאלִים בָּאֲבָנִים וּבַחִצִּים בַּקָָּשֶׁת]] 1Ch 12:2 using the right hand and the left hand with stones and with arrows in the bow (i.e. in throwing and shooting).
